name: 300: Rise of an Empire
tagline: Greek general Themistokles leads the charge against invading Persian forces led by mortal-turned-god Xerxes and Artemisia, vengeful commander of the Persian navy.

name: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
tagline: Benjamin Barry is an advertising executive and ladies' man who, to win a big campaign, bets that he can make a woman fall in love with him in 10 days. Andie Anderson covers the "How To" beat for "Composure" magazine and is assigned to write an article on "How to Lose a Guy in 10 days." They meet in a bar shortly after the bet is made.

name: Porky's
tagline: Set in 1954, a group of Florida high schoolers seek out to help a buddy lose his virginity, which leads them to seek revenge on a sleazy nightclub owner and his redneck sheriff brother for harassing them.

name: The First Wives Club
tagline: Reunited by the death of a college friend, three divorced women seek revenge on the husbands who left them for younger women.

name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
tagline: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

name: George of the Jungle
tagline: George grows up in the jungle raised by apes. Based on the Cartoon series.

name: Robin Hood
tagline: In 13th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.

name: Phenomenon
tagline: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
tagline: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

name: The Princess and the Frog
tagline: A fairy tale set in Jazz Age-era New Orleans and centered on a young woman named Tiana and her fateful kiss with a frog prince who desperately wants to be human again.

name: American Wedding
tagline: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.

name: Daddy Day Care
tagline: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.

name: Road to Perdition
tagline: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.

name: Paranormal Activity 3
tagline: In 1988, young sisters Katie and Kristi befriend an invisible entity who resides in their home.

name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
tagline: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

name: Dick Tracy
tagline: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.

name: Rise of the Guardians
tagline: When the evil spirit Pitch launches an assault on Earth, the Immortal Guardians team up to protect the innocence of children all around the world.

name: Dreamgirls
tagline: Based on the Broadway musical, a trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s.

name: Nine to Five
tagline: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

name: Just Go with It
tagline: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.

name: Scream
tagline: A killer known as Ghostface begins killing off teenagers, and as the body count begins rising, one girl and her friends find themselves contemplating the "Rules" of horror films as they find themselves living in a real-life one.

name: The Expendables
tagline: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

name: Jaws 2
tagline: Police chief Brody must protect the citizens of Amity after a second monstrous shark begins terrorizing the waters.

name: Bambi
tagline: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest after his mother is shot by hunters.

name: The General's Daughter

production.name: MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH & Company I. Produktions KG

tagline: When the daughter of a well-known and well-respected base commander is murdered, an undercover detective is summoned to look into the matter and finds a slew of cover-ups at West Point.

name: The Aviator

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 3. Produktions KG

tagline: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary director and aviator Howard Hughes' career, from the late 1920s to the mid-1940s.

name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
tagline: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

name: In the Line of Fire
tagline: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.

name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
tagline: Two Western bank/train robbers flee to Bolivia when the law gets too close.

name: Mary Poppins
tagline: A magic nanny comes to work for a cold banker's unhappy family.

name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
tagline: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

name: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
tagline: 86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.

name: Pacific Rim
tagline: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

name: American Pie
tagline: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
tagline: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

name: Gone in Sixty Seconds
tagline: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal 50 cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

name: Maverick
tagline: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

name: Sleeping with the Enemy
tagline: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

name: This Is the End
tagline: While attending a party at James Franco's house, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel and many other celebrities are faced with the apocalypse.

name: Scream 2
tagline: Two years after the events of the first film, a new psychopath dons the "Ghost face" costume and a new string of murders begin.

name: Eraser
tagline: A Witness Protection specialist becomes suspicious of his co-workers when dealing with a case involving high-tech weapons.

name: The Prince of Egypt
tagline: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and, later his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

name: Unforgiven
tagline: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.

name: Eagle Eye
tagline: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

name: Con Air
tagline: A newly released ex-con and former US Ranger finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.

name: Sleepy Hollow
tagline: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.

name: Contact
tagline: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of intelligent aliens, who send plans for a mysterious machine.

name: The Pelican Brief
tagline: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

name: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
tagline: The Angels investigate a series of murders that occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

name: Vanilla Sky
tagline: A successful publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal after a car accident with a jaded lover.

name: The Rugrats Movie
tagline: Tommy, Angelica, Chuckie, Phil and Lil get lost while on vacation and must find their way home.

name: Airport
tagline: Melodrama about a bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

name: Step Brothers
tagline: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents get married.

name: Due Date
tagline: High-strung father-to-be Peter Highman is forced to hitch a ride with aspiring actor Ethan Tremblay on a road trip in order to make it to his child's birth on time.

name: Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
tagline: Sally and Conrad are two bored kids whose life is turned up-side-down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

name: Million Dollar Baby
tagline: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

name: Casper
tagline: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by 3 mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

name: Bad Teacher
tagline: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job and her students is forced to return to her job to make enough money for a boob job after her rich fiancé dumps her.

name: Evan Almighty
tagline: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.

name: Shakespeare in Love
tagline: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

name: Cowboys & Aliens
tagline: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.

name: Jumanji
tagline: When two kids find and play a magical board game, they release a man trapped for decades in it and a host of dangers that can only be stopped by finishing the game.

name: Yogi Bear
tagline: A documentary filmmaker travels to Jellystone Park to shoot a project and soon crosses paths with Yogi Bear, his sidekick Boo-Boo, and Ranger Smith.

name: Se7en
tagline: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
tagline: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

name: Parenthood
tagline: The Buckman family is a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressures of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

name: You Don't Mess with the Zohan
tagline: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.

name: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
tagline: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

name: Collateral
tagline: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.

name: Gnomeo & Juliet
tagline: The neighboring gardens of Montague and Capulet are at war, but the gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet, are in love.

name: Hercules
tagline: The son of the Greek Gods Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

name: Noah
tagline: A man is chosen by his world's creator to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

name: Olympus Has Fallen
tagline: Disgraced former Presidential guard Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack; using his inside knowledge, Banning works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

name: The Green Hornet
tagline: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his father's large company, teams up with his late dad's assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.

name: Date Night
tagline: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.

name: Meet the Robinsons
tagline: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

name: Yes Man
tagline: A guy challenges himself to say "yes" to everything for an entire year.

name: Inspector Gadget
tagline: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

name: Public Enemies
tagline: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

name: The Social Network
tagline: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the cofounder who was later squeezed out of the business.

name: The Others
tagline: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.

name: Schindler's List
tagline: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

name: Dead Poets Society
tagline: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to a love of poetry and to seize the day.

name: Cold Mountain
tagline: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.

name: Michael
tagline: Two tabloid reporters checking out a report of the Archangel Michael living with an old woman find that it's true. But that's not the only surprise.

name: Sex and the City 2
tagline: While wrestling with the pressures of life, love, and work in Manhattan, Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte join Samantha for a trip to Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates), where Samantha's ex is filming a new movie.

name: Norbit
tagline: A mild-mannered guy who is engaged to a monstrous woman meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.

name: Panic Room
tagline: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.

name: The Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
tagline: Now settled in Genovia, Princess Mia faces a new revelation: she's being primed for an arranged marriage to a English suitor.

name: Legally Blonde
tagline: When a blonde sorority queen is dumped by her boyfriend, she decides to follow him to law school to get him back and, once there, learns she has more legal savvy than she ever imagined.
The life story of Jackie Robinson and his history-making signing with the Brooklyn Dodgers under the guidance of team executive Branch Rickey.

name: Unbreakable
tagline: A suspense thriller with supernatural overtones that revolves around a man who learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

name: Flashdance
tagline: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

name: The Book of Eli
tagline: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

name: 10,000 BC
tagline: A prehistoric epic that follows a young mammoth hunter's journey through uncharted territory to secure the future of his tribe.

name: Beverly Hills Chihuahua
tagline: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.
